description:
For their first task, Kazuma and Kawachi must make a butter roll… but Kazuma chose the worst possible butter for the assignment! Can he possibly make anything good enough to pass?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Des restes !! Kazuma choisit le pire des beurres !
Kuzukasu!! Kazuma ga Eranda Saitei Butter!
Riffraff Scum!! Kazuma Chooses the Worst Butter!
เจ้าพวกห่วยแตก กับ เนยยอดแย่ที่คาสึมะเลือก!
クズカスッ!! 和馬が選んだ最低バター!
